description: API for user authentication and digital card management.

/auth/login.summary: Login and receive access token (access token in body, refresh token as cookie)

/auth/refresh-token.summary: Refresh access token using refresh token cookie

Digital Card.description: Endpoints for creating, updating, deleting, and fetching digital cards

/api/digital-card/getDigitalCard/{userCa.summary: Get a public digital card by user ID

/api/digital-card/delete.summary: Delete the authenticated user's digital card (protected)

/api/digital-card/update.summary: Update the authenticated user's digital card (protected)
